title: WAIT: Viola Davis' 'The Woman King' Was Pro-Slavery?!
description: Time to expose the historical inaccuracies of "The Woman King." There are a lot! Also, it's no longer hyperbole to call the Washington Post the enemy of the people. And it looks like we won't have Trevor Noah to kick around any more.
itunes:author: Blaze Podcast Network
